Information: Crystal-Clear Audio Makes You Sound Like a Pro

Part Name: DJI Mic (2 TX + 1 RX + Charging Case) Wireless Lavalier Microphone
Information: 14-Hour Recording - 8GB of internal storage can handle up to 14 hours of 48kHz 24-bit audio without compression. It can record separately and output audio files quickly to a computer using a data cable.

Part Name: DJI Mic 2 (1 TX + 1 RX) Wireless Microphone with Intelligent Noise Cancelling
Information: DJI OsmoAudio - The transmitter supports direct connection for premium sound quality to Osmo Action 5 Pro, Osmo Action 4, or Osmo Pocket 3 without a receiver.

Part Name: DJI Mic (1 TX + 1 RX) Wireless Lavalier Microphone
Information: Compared with DJI Mic (2 TX plus 1 RX plus Charging Case), DJI Mic (1 TX plus 1 RX) includes only one transmitter and no charging case. It is more suitable for solo operators to vlog or livestream with.

Part Name: DJI Mic 2 Transmitter (Shadow Black) Wireless Microphone
Information: DJI OsmoAudio - The transmitter supports direct connection for premium sound quality to Osmo Action 5 Pro, Osmo Action 4, or Osmo Pocket 3 without a receiver.
